  • Uses of VulkanFreeable in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan

    Subinterfaces of VulkanFreeable in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    Allocator
    An Allocator allocates Allocator.Memory in Vulkan using Allocator.MemoryAllocationInfo.
    interface 
    Pipeline
    Pipelines are the way of doing work on the GPU, either by a GraphicsPipeline, a RayTracePipeline, or a ComputePipeline.
    interface 
    ShaderCompiler
    A ShaderCompiler compiles some source string (language Implementation dependent) to spir-V.
    Classes in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan that implement VulkanFreeable
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final record 
    Buffer
    Buffers represent linear arrays of data which are used for various purposes by binding them to a graphics or compute pipeline via descriptor sets or certain commands, or by directly specifying them as parameters to certain commands.
    class 
    ComputePipeline
    Compute pipelines consist of a single static compute ShaderStage and the PipelineLayout.
    class 
    DescriptorPool
    A Descriptor Pool holds some amount of Descriptors.
    class 
    DescriptorSetLayout
    A descriptor set layout object is defined by an array of zero or more descriptor bindings.
    class 
    Framebuffer
    Render passes operate in conjunction with framebuffers.
    class 
    GraphicsPipeline
    Graphics pipelines consist of multiple ShaderStages, multiple fixed-function pipeline stages (by default all included), and a PipelineLayout.
    final record 
    Image
    Images represent multidimensional - up to 3 - arrays of data which can be used for various purposes (e.g. attachments, textures), by binding them to a graphics or compute pipeline via descriptor sets, or by directly specifying them as parameters to certain commands.
    class 
    PipelineLayout
    A PipelineLayout configures what DescriptorSetLayouts and push-constants are used.
    class 
    RayTracePipeline
    Ray tracing pipelines consist of multiple ShaderStages, fixed-function traversal stages, and a PipelineLayout.
    class 
    RenderPass
    Draw commands must be recorded within a render pass instance.
    class 
    Sampler
    VkSampler objects represent the state of an image sampler which is used by the implementation to read image data and apply filtering and other transformations for the shader.
    class 
    ShaderModule
    Shader modules contain shader code and one or more entry points.
    class 
    VulkanInstance
    There is no global state in Vulkan and all per-application state is stored in a VkInstance object.
    static final record 
    VulkanInstance.Device
    A representation of a device, eg. your graphics card or some integrated graphics of your CPU
